page.title: 15EDUCATION AT GLASSARY SCHOOL
page.content: MOST OF THE CHILDREN WHO ATTEND GLASSARY PRIMARY SCHOOL ARE RESIDENT IN THE VILLAGE BUT THE CATCHMENT AREA FOR THE SCHOOL EXTENDS FOR MANY MILES AROUND. CHILDREN FROM BRIDGEND, DRIMVORE, DALVORE AND KILMICHAEL GLEN ALSO ATTEND THE SCHOOL. IF THE DISTANCE THEY HAVE TO TRAVEL EXCEEDS ONE MILE THEY ARE ENTITLED TO USE THE SCHOOL TRANSPORT WHICH IS PROVIDED. THE SCHOOL CURRICULUM CONSISTS OF ENGLISH, MATHEMATICS, WRITING, GEOGRAPHY, HISTORY, SCIENCE AND HEALTH, MUSIC, DRAMA, ART AND CRAFTS, PHYSICAL EDUCATION AND SWIMMING. THE ENGLISH SCHEME OF WORK IS BASED ON THE{DRAKE EDUCATIONAL LANGUAGE {CENTRES}AND THE MATHS SCHEME USED IS { THE{SCOTTISH PRIMARY MATHEMATIC GROUP. THE READING IS BASED ON{BREAKTHROUGH } AND{GINN 360.
